resources.string:
Terms and Conditions: 
 1. Drozee surfaces is a part of Stanzaa Enterprise. 
 2. Originally the membership is of Rs 699 which is reduced to Rs 299 for the members registering till 31st of December. 
 3. Any gift vouchers which is in its validation period is applicable as the above-mentioned reduced price. 
 4. Students of the age group of 18+ should avail red carpet credit card at free of cost with just a minor KYC. 
 5. Those who fail to do so or don’t want to avail this advantage will be charged Rs 399 per year. 
 6. At max 12 books will be issued on one membership per year. 
 7. No vouchers will be applicable on the cost paid for extending limit of number of books per year. 
 8. Novel’s pick up and delivery will be done in colleges on weekdays on a specified day of the month. 
 9. For home delivery and pickup each round will cost an extra amount of Rs 50. 
 10. Home delivery and pick up will be done on any day as per your preference. 
 11. You can return the book within two days of purchase (for purchased books only). 
 Terms of Use: 
 1. Use of ink on books is prohibited, if done fine will be charged. 
 2. In case of any wear book will not be accepted and further deliveries will be cancelled if no payment for the wear and tear is received. 
 3. Return policy is not applicable on books with torn pages or any other kind of wear and tear.
